trans-unit.source: Freezes a string literal when creating native images using the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md).
trans-unit.target: 在使用 [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md) 创建本机映像时冻结字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> class has been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute>类已弃用.NET framework 版本 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和更高版本。

trans-unit.source: A frozen string is a string literal object that is compatible with the managed heap and has been serialized into a native image by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md).
trans-unit.target: 冻结的字符串是与托管堆兼容并已序列化到由本机映像的字符串文本对象[Ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> attribute allows you to optimize your code by pre-allocating string literals during native image generation rather than at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute>特性，您可以通过预分配字符串文本在本机映像生成过程中，而不在运行时优化你的代码。

trans-unit.source: After a string literal has been frozen, code can simply refer to the string using the address in the native image.
trans-unit.target: 字符串文本已被冻结后，代码可以只是指在本机映像使用的地址的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> must be applied on the assembly level.
Note that the common language runtime (CLR) cannot unload any native image that has a frozen string because any object in the heap might refer to the frozen string.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不会卸载任何已冻结的字符串，因为在堆中的任何对象的本机映像可能指冻结的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> class only in cases where the native image that contains the frozen string is shared heavily.
trans-unit.target: 因此，应使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute>仅在包含该冻结的字符串的本机映像被广泛共享的情况下的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何应用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute>的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute> to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何应用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute>的程序集。
